name: like_tweet
description: Like a specific tweet by navigating to its URL and clicking the like button.

parameters.name: tweet_url
parameters.description: Full URL of the tweet to like (e.g. https://x.com/user/status/123456)

steps.code: const likeBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="like"]'); const unlikeBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="unlike"]'); if (unlikeBtn) return { already_liked: true, message: 'Tweet is already liked' }; if (likeBtn) { likeBtn.click(); return { success: true, message: 'Tweet liked' }; } return { success: false, message: 'Like button not found' }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Like the tweet (skip if already liked)
